entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0080.8519] ifrs-full:FinanceCostsPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities has a value of -6,100,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:FinanceCostsPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/7437007YPUOQZ8OV1R42/2020-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/kojamo-2020-12-31.zip/kojamo-2020-12-31/reports/kojamo-2020-12-31.html 15423

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9540] Assets with a value of 7,261,500,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 342,700,000 + 6,916,400,000 ) with a value of 7,259,100,000. These values should be equal. If assets held for sale is included in the Statement of Financial Position presentation, then consider using CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners instead of current assets. The properties of this ifrs-full:Assets fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Assets : -6 Decimals of Current Assets : -5 Decimals of Non Current Assets : -6
Rule Element Id:9540 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/7437007YPUOQZ8OV1R42/2020-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/kojamo-2020-12-31.zip/kojamo-2020-12-31/reports/kojamo-2020-12-31.html 15320

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [210000] Statement of financial position, current/non-current includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:Assets of 7,261,500,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 7,259,100,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:Assets that should add to 7,261,500,000 are comprised of the following:
+ CurrentAssets 342,700,000 (Incorrect decimals: -5 ) + NoncurrentAssets 6,916,400,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [210000] Statement of financial position, current/non-current. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:Assets Total Value : 7,261,500,000 Total period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/7437007YPUOQZ8OV1R42/2020-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/kojamo-2020-12-31.zip/kojamo-2020-12-31/reports/kojamo-2020-12-31.html 15320

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [320000] Statement of comprehensive income, profit or loss, by nature of expense includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ProfitLoss of 312,900,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 469,600,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ProfitLoss that should add to 312,900,000 are comprised of the following:
- CurrentTaxExpenseIncome -16,900,000 - DeferredTaxExpenseIncomeRelatingToOriginationAndReversalOfTemporaryDifferences -61,500,000 + ProfitLossBeforeTax 391,200,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [320000] Statement of comprehensive income, profit or loss, by nature of expense. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:ProfitLoss Total Value : 312,900,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -5 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/7437007YPUOQZ8OV1R42/2020-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/kojamo-2020-12-31.zip/kojamo-2020-12-31/reports/kojamo-2020-12-31.html 15423
